bibl.title: The Metrological Reasons for the Difference in Aristotle's and Androtion's Statements about Solon's Change of the Weight of the Mina.
bibl.note: Summary of a paper read at the sixty-fifth general meeting of the Archaeological Institute of America (1963).
bibl.seg: Reifler Erwin, The Metrological Reasons for the Difference in Aristotle's and Androtion's Statements about Solon's Change of the Weight of the Mina.
